You pulled out a lightsaber, and cut through the lock, opening the door. The Jedi was sitting in the chair, feet and hands tied down and a gag over her mouth.
"Look around," you said "See if there are any clues to where the hunter has gone."
You ran over to the Jedi, cutting through both the hand and foot ropes, and pulling off the gag.
"Can you walk?" you asked, the Jedi nodded.
"Ray Tanner," you said, holding out your hand "Saber Knight, we heard about you leaving the Jedi, and came to offer you a place with us."
"Whatever," said the Jedi "Just get me out of here, before Sool gets back."
"Why are you so scared of him?" you asked
"He's a Sith," she said "More powerful than any I've ever heard about, if he comes back, we're done for."
"Master," said Maria "What's this?"

You walked over to her to see a 3d screen showing the planet Tatooine, coming closer and closer, passing into it's atmosphere and toward the planet below.
"Space to ground missile!" you shouted "We need to run, now!"
You led Maria and the Jedi out of the door and away from the disused moisture farm. When you heard a whistling noise, you threw yourself to the ground as the other two did the same. A blast of heat came over your head.
"That," said Maria "Was a little too close."
You looked round to see blackened sand, mere inches from where Maria was lying.
"We're fine," said the Jedi "We should get back to your ship, and get out of here, the bounty hunter will be off-planet by now."
1311111121122.title: On the ship

choices: The Jedi team arrives, and is shot down by the Bounty Hunter
13111111211222.content:
"Sool Carben is dangerous," you said "Too dangerous for us to leave alive. We need to show him we're still alive."
"How do you propose we do that?" asked Maria
You turned to the Jedi "You still haven't told us your name," you stated
"Cecelia Darken," said the Jedi "I was sent to capture Sool Carben and bring him to the council for judging, this was before we knew he was Sith, he turned the tables on me and kidnapped me, he kept on saying he was going to take me to his master."
"Then we need you to contact the Jedi Council," you said to Cecelia "Tell them you're alive, and ask them to send a ship, that'll force the Bounty Hunter into the open, and we can take him out."
"It's a good plan," said Cecelia "But what's to stop him firing a missile at us again?"
"Just a hunch," said Maria "But he pulled you out to a moisture farm on the Dune Sea, he doesn't want people to know about him more than is necessary, he'll have to come down to the planet to find us and kill us."
"I'll make the call," said Cecelia "I don't want to abandon my mission, but I'm scared, and that sort of emotion is not the Jedi way."
"There's nothing wrong with a bit of fear," you said "As long as you don't let it take you over, the Saber Knights were created because there is always a balance to be kept between good and evil, but it's not only emotions that can turn people to either the dark side or the light side, our people are free to experience emotions how they want, as well as have relationships with others in our order as well as outside it, these relationships are not a weakness, as the Jedi think to believe, but a strength."
"I would like to learn more about your order," said Cecelia "But for now, let's get back to your Mos Eisley, and contact the Jedi Council."

You, Maria and Cecelia walked back into Mos Eisley and to a comm station. Paying for the use of it, Cecelia contacted the council. The hologram showed a small, green creature of a species you couldn't identify, but you did recognise this particular creature. Master Yoda, the head of the Jedi order.
"News, you have, Cecelia, mmm?" said Yoda, who examined you and Maria with curiosity.
"The Bounty Hunter was a Sith," said Cecelia "Trained in the Dark Side, he captured me, I managed to get away with the help of these two force users."
"Force, users you say?" said Yoda "Not Jedi, I think, nor Sith, but no other factions there are."
"We are called Saber Knights," you said "We have isolated ourselves from the civilized galaxy, taking in any from either the Jedi or the Sith who wish to change their ways, but will not be accepted by the opposite order, we work to maintain the balance between good and evil in the universe."
"We can discuss this later," said Cecelia "Right now, I need pickup."
"Near your position, a Jedi team is, meet with you, they will," said Yoda, and the hologram turned off.

"Now all we have to do is find a defendable location and wait for the Bounty Hunter to come to us," said Maria, as if this was the easiest thing in the world.
"I doubt it will be that easy," you said
They quickly found a defendable location, a T-junction facing the spaceport.
13111111211222.title: Search for the Bounty Hunter

choices: You track her through her force signature
131111112112222.content:
"Calling Cecelia," a voice came over Cecelia's Jedi communicator "Jedi Master Soara Antana inbound, what's your position?"
You looked up, just in time to see a Jedi starfighter, modified to sit two people, coming through the upper atmosphere.
"I read you, Master Antana," said Cecelia "We're in Mos Eisley Spaceport, ready for pickup."
She turned off her communicator and joined you, watching the sky.
"She trained me in lightsaber combat, you know," she said "She's one of the best there is with a lightsaber."

You watched as the starfighter dipped lower. Suddenly, you saw something glint behind the ship. Before your brain had even registered what it was, you were running.
"Daria, Cecelia, with me," you said
"What is it?" asked Cecelia "What's wrong?"
"See the glint behind the starfighter?" you said, pointing "Missile, must be pretty primitive so as not to show up on scanners."
Before you could say anything more, there was an explosion, and the starfighter started falling towards the desert sands. You ran, using the force to lend speed to your movements. You got to the dunes before the ship, turned, and put both your arms out to the sides. You felt a wave of force energy emanate from you and surround the starfighter, slowing all movement and containing all mechanical energy within. The starfighter had come to a complete halt. You used the Force to lower the ship to the ground.

The canopy popped open, and two human females exited the starfighter.
"Thank you for your assistance, stranger," said the older of the two "I confess I was foolish to think that a bounty hunter would not have a countermeasure for ships coming to reinforce, that was some fantastic forcework you pulled, where's Cecelia?"
You looked around. Cecelia was nowhere to be found.
131111112112222.title: The Jedi team arrives, and is shot down by the ...

1311111121122221.content:
You closed your eyes, reaching out with your force senses. You felt many small organisms in the sand around you, and you shut them out, continuing your search outwards. Eventually, you lock onto her signature in the force, but she wasn't the only force user in that location. The other was a dark side user.
"We need to move fast," you said, signalling to Maria, who also had her eyes closed, to get moving. They sprinted off in the direction of Cecelia, Soara and her apprentice taking up the rear. You soon caught up to the bounty hunter. He was carrying a deactivated lightsaber in one hand, and the unconscious body of Cecelia in the other. You nodded to Maria, and signalled with one hand. They split, each going to a different flank of the bounty hunter. You put a finger to your mouth. Maria nodded, and pulled out a lightsaber, igniting it. It ignited without a sound, as you did the same. You then focussed your force powers on freeing Cecelia, while Maria charged, yelling a battle cry as she swung her lightsaber. Sool ignited his red lightsaber and brought it up to block, but in doing so, his grip on Cecelia became less secure. You used the Force to pull her away from him. You threw a lightsaber to her, and she jumped into the air with the Force to catch it, before landing in a defensive posture. After seeing that she was all right, you charged into combat with the bounty hunter. You sensed Soara Antana and her apprentice approaching, their lightsabers also drawn. Carben, apparently seeing the odds stacked against him, pulled something out of his pocket and threw it at the two Jedi. You used the Force to stop it in the air, but he had already taken off running. The object held in the air exploded, sending out a wave of concussive force that forced them all to the ground.
Soara's apprentice cried out as blood dripped from a wound in her stomach. A knife was buried there.
"Is she all right?" you asked Soara nodded, and indicated that you should pursue the Sith. You ran in the same direction the hunter had gone, Maria close behind.
1311111121122221.title: You track her through her force signature

choices: Sool Carben uses a force power to knock both you and Maria over
13111111211222211.content:
You soon catch up to the bounty hunter, Maria just on your heels. He ran into an aircraft hangar, people scattering as they tried to dodge out of the way, some being knocked flying. You signalled to Maria, and then ignited a lightsaber and threw it to the right of him. As expected, he veered to the left. Maria jumped over one of the starships in the hangar, landing in front of Carben, as you did the same, jumping behind him, igniting two lightsabers as you did, crossing them both in front of his neck, as Maria extended her lightsaber towards him.

"You should give up," you advised "You're surrounded."
"This is my turf, Jedi," said Carben "You walked right into my trap."
Several black-suited men revealed themselves, all pointing weapons at the two. The men wore helmets with T's on them.
"I have powerful friends on Mandalore," said Carben "They sent me a personal guard for my mission. I can assure you, they're some of the best trained men in the galaxy."
You looked to Maria, then nodded. Maria deactivated her lightsaber, at the same time pressing the buttons to deactivate all the invisible lightsabers on her person, levitating them off her body and igniting.
"We have no quarrel with you, sons of Mandalore," you said "If you leave now, we will not follow you, and we shall not pursue you. If you fight, we will be forced to destroy you."
13111111211222211.title: You find him

choices: You ask Cecelia if she wishes to join the Saber Knights
131111112112222111.content:
One of the Mandalorians loosed a blaster bolt at you. Maria moved a single finger, and a lightsaber intercepted the blast, sending it back at the Mandalorian who shot it. That same lightsaber then buried itself in the Mandalorian's chest. He fell to the ground, dead.
"Once again, I give you the option to leave," you said, calmly "Don't make the same mistake your friend did."

Suddenly, as one, the Mandalorians rose into the air, hovering with their jetpacks.
"Looks like we're going to have to fight," said Maria, removing her concentration from the lightsabers and forced Carben into a wall at speed. He slid down the wall, unconscious. Simultaneously, you caught the falling lightsabers, and formed a criss-cross of lasers blocking blaster lines from each of the Mandalorians.
"Ready?" you asked Maria. She ignited her double-sided lightsaber.
"Ready," she said. You both jumped, the lightsabers parting to allow them to fly right at separate Mandalorians. You sliced the head off one with both your lightsabers, and then threw both lightsabers at two others, both finding their mark, before falling back through the protective net of lightsabers. Then, holding it up so Maria could concentrate more force energy on attacking Mandalorians. Maria used her double bladed lightsaber to parry several blasts at her, before using her other lightsaber to stab through the Mandalorian, stabbing into it's jet pack, then jumping away as it exploded. She landed back within the protected area of the lightsaber net. As she did so, the door opened, and three females entered, their lightsabers drawn as they leapt at the Mandalorians, dispatching them quickly. You took the time to deactivate the lightsaber net, and go to restrain Sool Carben with force-resistant cuffs, created by the Saber Knights for the less cooperative among them. It would stop him from calling on the Force.
131111112112222111.title: The Mandalorians attack

1311111121122221112.content:
"We came here to offer Cecelia a place in our order," you said "We've seen far too many Jedi leave the order and fall to the dark side, we wish to offer an alternative."
"What can you tell me of your order?" asked Soara "I don't want to condone an order that could potentially become another Sith."
"The Saber Knights are neither on the dark side or the light side of the Force," you said "There is an old Jedi tale, older than the formation of the order, there was once a group of very powerful force users, known as the Father, the Son and the Daughter, who were the embodiment of the balance, dark and light sides of the Force respectively. It was also said, that their home planet, Mortis, was the birthplace of the Force itself. The Son and the Daughter were in constant conflict, stopped from tearing their home apart only by the efforts of their father. Like The Father, the Saber Knights attempt to maintain balance between the Jedi and the Sith."
"What is balance?" asked Soara "That could be interpreted in many ways."
"Is there not a Jedi legend of a Chosen One?" Maria asked "A fatherless child that will bring balance to the Force?"
All of the Jedi's eyes turned to Maria.
"Even the Jedi believe in bringing balance to the Force," you said "They hope for a person who will destroy the Sith, and bring what they believe is balance to the Force, but they fail to see that destruction of the Sith will not bring balance, it will only tip the scales too much in favour of the Jedi. What repercussions this will have, or even already has been with the peace the Jedi have experienced for so long, I do not know."
"Then what is the purpose of the Saber Knights?" asked Cecelia
"We take action when the scales tip too much in either direction," you said "But we keep our order secret from the rest of the galaxy, posing as Jedi, Sith or normal people as the situation arises. If it came out that we existed, there would be complications."
"We are not ruled entirely by emotions or discipline, as the Sith and Jedi are, we have found harmony between light and dark, and as such, we are free of the corruption on either side," said Maria "At least come and try it out, Cecelia, although we must warn you, we will have to mind wipe your memories of us, as we will be of Soara and Darsha, you can understand the precaution."
"I do," said Soara "And I consent to this, I know what the implications would be if people found out about your order."
"What about Carben?" asked Darsha, looking to the unconscious bounty hunter.
"We'll take him back to our temple," said Maria "He will stand trial for his crimes, and be punished, or redeemed through induction into the Saber Knights."
"What about you, Cecelia?" you said "What will you decide to do?"
1311111121122221112.title: You ask Cecelia if she wishes to join the Saber...

13111111211222211122.content:
"What of my friends at the temple?" said Cecelia "I left the temple, but it's apparent they still know of me. They won't forget me, more Jedi teams will come. I don't want to be completely forgotten in the temple. While I became disillusioned in the Jedi, I can still see the merit of having contacts in each other's orders, in case of emergencies."
"Are you saying you don't want us to mind wipe Soara and Darsha?" Maria asked.
You remained silent. It honestly wasn't a bad idea. There would be a point in the future where it would be to their benefit to have information from the Jedi.
"Very well," you said "Darsha, Soara, we're putting a tremendous amount of trust in you. Everyone else we've ever worked with or against has been mind-wiped. As far as most of the Jedi order will be concerned, Cecelia was being pursued by a bounty hunter, but both of them vanished on Tatooine. Tell only who you know you can trust to keep secret the truth."
Soara nodded. "We will keep your secret as long as it does not put our order in danger or jeopardy."
"That is all we can ask," said Maria. Both you and Maria shook hands with the Jedi, and, slinging Carben over your shoulder, you indicated to Cecelia to follow you.
13111111211222211122.title: Join the Saber Knights

131111112112222111222.content:
As they arrived in the hangar, Carben began to stir. Cecelia immediately drew her lightsaber, but you put up your hand, signalling her to wait. You put Sool Carben on the ground, having already disarmed him of the multitude of weapons on his body.
"Uh, what happened?" he asked, holding his head slightly "Who are you people?"
"We just fought," said Maria "Why doesn't he remember?"
"We're friends," you said "We're taking you somewhere safe."
"O.K," said Carben. You opened up the ship, and led Carben, who was now walking, into the ship.
"You just lay down in here," you said, leading him into one of the sleeping areas of the ship "You've had a rough day."
Carben lay down on the bed, as you closed the door behind you, going back to the cockpit.
"Did you get the ship's scan?" you asked Maria, as she was typing on a screen. A picture of what looked like a modified brain came up on the screen.
"Seems like he's some kind of cyborg, Master," said Maria "Several parts of his brain have been modified, replaced with machine parts, but what's more, it seems like there are transmitters in his head, someone was able to see through his eyes, hear what he hears."
"I assume they also wiped his memory?" asked Cecelia
"Hard to say," said Maria "I'm not sure how sturdy that equipment is, a bump from the fight might have caused memory loss. That's not the important thing right now, though."
"We need to trace that transmitter signal," you said "If someone else was listening in, we need to find out and make sure they forget."
131111112112222111222.title: Carben wakes up

choices: Daria collapses from the effort of keeping six lightsabers fighting at once
1311111122.content:
"Time, it is, for the Saber Knights to reveal themselves, the Chosen One has been found" said Yano. Murmurs came from everywhere in the room. While probing the future, the most experienced Saber Masters had found evidence that the Chosen One would bring balance to the Force, unlike the Jedi, the Saber Masters knew that bringing balance to the force would mean the destruction of almost every Jedi and Sith in existence. The Saber Knights were the ones who kept balance in the Force. They had orchestrated the Sith wars which eventually destroyed almost all of the Sith. They believed the Force was in balance then, but more beings were born and they tipped the scales. The Chosen One was said to be the one who would bring final balance to the force.
"Go to the Jedi Temple, we must" said Yano "Find Anakin Skywalker and take him to the Ilum Temple for training"
You, Sona Seer and Yano got into a transport. Sona's padawan, Daria, also stepped into the transport. You took the pilot seat, and went through the pre-flight checks. Then, you started up the engines and lifted off. The ship soon cleared the Ilum atmosphere and set a course for Coruscant. As you piloted, you heard someone come in. Putting the ship on auto pilot, you turned to find Daria sitting in the copilots seat. "I've never been on a mission before" said Daria "I'm feeling a bit nervous
"Well, technically, this isn't a mission, we're just going to meet Anakin Skywalker and then probably leave" you say "Nothing to worry about"
"Do you go on many missions?" asked Daria
"Quite a lot" you say "I'm always told to avoid revealing myself to Jedi, so this is a new experience for me"
"Daria" said Sona's voice from behind. You looked round to see her come into the cockpit.
"I'm just about set to go into hyperspace" you say "Go and strap yourselves in"
Sona and Daria left the cockpit and you set the hyperspace coordinates. The stars became streaks. The ship nav computer calculated that the hyperspace jump would take six hours. You unstrapped yourself and went to join the rest of the crew. Daria was having a lightsaber lesson with Sona. Twelve lightsabers were suspended in midair, locked together in separate battles. In the centre of this battle, Sona and Daria were similarly engaged.
1311111122.title: Yano comes to the room, looking for you

13111111222.content:
Daria collapsed to the ground, panting in exhaustion
"You are not working hard enough" said Sona "That's not even half the lightsabers I can control and you can't even control that"
"I tried, Master" said Daria "I really did try"
"This lesson is over" said Sona, stalking away to her quarters. Who do you speak to?
13111111222.title: Daria collapses from the effort of keeping six ...

131111112221.content:
You sit down next to the exhausted Daria.
"Sona pushes you too hard" you say
"She's the best Saber Knight in the temple, I should be able to live up to it" said Daria
"Sona wasn't always as strong in the force as she is now" you say "She used to be the personal assassin of Darth Plagus"
Daria looked up at you in amazement. "She was trained in the Force by a Sith?" she asked.
You nodded. "During one of her missions, she discovered the Ilum temple, she elected to stay, but not until after she slit the throat of Plagus, she went off to do this, but she was too late, Plagus' apprentice had already done it"
"I don't think I could make it as her apprentice" said Daria "I think she pushes me too hard"
"I agree" said Sona. You had sensed her standing there, but had neglected to mention it to Daria, "I think Master Tanner should train you from now on, if you aren't getting anywhere with me, perhaps you need a new master"
"But-" said Daria, but Sona cut her off
"It's your decision of course, but I think it would be better for you" said Sona
Daria considered for a long while, looking from Sona to you.
131111112221.title: Speak to Daria

1311111122211.content:
"If both of you think it would be better for me, I guess I'll train with you, Master" said Daria
"I would be honored to accept you as my padawan" you say "Now, go and get some rest"
Daria left the training room and went to her sleeping quarters.
"She'll be better with you" said Sona "I wish I had done better with her, but it can't be helped, she never really trusted me"
"Why's that?" you asked
"She sensed darkness in me, but I never told her that I used to be Sith" said Sona "I think she'll do better with you, Master Tanner, she was my first padawan, perhaps i'll do better with my next one, knowing what i do now"
"I've never taken a padawan either" you say "I hope I do all right"
"I'm sure you'll do fine" said Sona "Tomorrow you should start her training, right now, I think we all need some sleep"
"I agree, see you tomorrow, Master Seer" you say, heading to your quarters
1311111122211.title: Daria chooses you

13111111222111.content:
You go to the wide area that had been set aside for training on the ship, and waited for Daria to join you. When she did, you told her to sit in a meditative position and focus her force powers. She did, and you felt the energy around her.
"Lightsabers have been placed around you, feel their energy, now lift up as many as you can" you say.
The lightsabers, one by one, raised into the air. Not long after that, there were six lightsabers in the air, the same number she was training with the other day, and more were rising. Soon, ten were in the air and you could feel her strain in trying to keep them up. "That's enough, bring them down now" you say. The ten lightsabers lowered slowly to the ground. Daria opened her eyes.
"You did well" you say
"I only got ten lightsabers up" said Daria "That's not doing well"
"It's not the number of lightsabers you can get up, it's what you do with them while they're up" you say "Sona was pushing you too hard, trying to get you to control six lightsabers, plus the one you were holding"
"How many should I have had up?" asked Daria
"Since you can hold up ten, i'd say five maximum" you say "Now, take one lightsaber and face me"
Daria a single lightsaber and faced you. You pulled out one of your own lightsabers, and ignited it.
"You and I shall spar with our lightsabers, then, when I think your ready, we will add more" you say. You take a battle poze, and Daria takes one too.
You and Daria circle each other, your lightsabers poised and ready.
13111111222111.title: The next morning, Daria's training

choices: The ship lands at the Jedi Temple
131111112221112.content:
You feel the force in Daria as she attacks, her consciousness is a wave of calm as she attacks and defends. "Good" you say, force jumping over her head and stabbing down in the process. Your lightsaber meets Daria's in a flurry of sparks. You land behind her and cut laterally, but your lightsaber whistles through the air as Daria bends her torso backwards and you missed. You held up your other hand. Daria ceased fighting. "Very good" you say "Lets add the second lightsaber now" You used the force to bring one of the lightsabers on the ground to your hand, before igniting it. Daria, on the other hand, levitated one of the lightsabers before igniting it. You charged at her again, your lightsabers a blur of color as you whirled them. You attacked Daria again and again, forcing her backwards. Then you sensed something in the force behind you, and force-jumped into the air to avoid the lightsaber that had come from behind. Daria caught her other lightsaber and jumped after you, aiming her right lightsaber at you. You engaged with your left lightsaber and attacked her with your right. She blocked with her left lightsaber. Both combatants landed safely on the ground. You once again held up your hand. Daria ceased her attack.
"You see?" you say "You don't need lots of lightsabers to be a formidable opponent, most Jedi wouldn't be able to stand up to that assault"
"Thank you for the lesson, Master Tanner" said Daria "I learned a lot today"
"Always a pleasure to help, Padawan Daria" you say, bowing to her "Remember what I taught you, you have great power, just the way you are, you don't need to change to keep up with Sona Seer"
"I'll remember that" said Daria
Suddenly, two alarms blared from the cockpit. You ran back in and sat at the controls for the return to realspace. "We're just coming into Coruscant now, we've got clearance to land at the Jedi Temple"
131111112221112.title: You and Daria spar

choices: They tell you to take him
1311111122211121.content:
You walked down the boarding ramp, your new padawan at your side. Sona Seer followed behind. Waiting to meet you on the landing platform were two brown hooded figures. One was humanoid, the same size and build as you. The smaller one resembled Master Yano, except his skin was green instead of blue. You had heard of this Jedi. Tales of his adventures had reached the Saber Knights. This was Jedi Grand Master Yoda.
"Identify yourself" said the taller of the two Jedi. As you looked him over, you realized you recognized him too. This was Mace Windu, the Jedi Master who had invented Vaapad.
"My name is Saber Knight Ray Tanner" you say "This is my recent padawan, Daria, and her former Master, Sona Seer, we have come to reveal ourselves to the Jedi, we know of the return of the Sith and we wish to aid you in fighting them"
"Great power I sense in you, Master Tanner" said the smaller Jedi known as Yoda "A strong connection to the Force, you have, as do you Sona Seer"
"All Saber Knights have the same connection" you say "I am not as powerful as Saber Grand Master Yano, Sona here is more powerful than I am"
"There is darkness around you, Sona Seer" said Mace Windu "You feel like a Sith"
Sona ignited one of her lightsabers. "And what does a Sith feel like, exactly?" she said, anger in her voice.
You used the Force to rip the lightsaber from her hand. "Calm down Sona, no one's judging you for your time with Darth Plagus"
"My own Padawan did" said Sona "Daria left me because of it"
"You and Daria were not suited to each other" you say "That was apparent before I ever told her about it"
Sona realized your logic, and calmed down. You handed her back the lightsaber you had taken from her.
"The Saber Knights are masters of the Lightsaber, and Sona is the greatest fighter with her lightsabers than anyone else in the Ilum Temple" you say
"Word has come to us that the Chosen One has been found" said Sona "However, we believe that he will eventually destroy both the Jedi and the Sith, a loss from which both Orders may never recover, we wish to take the Chosen One and train him to prevent this from happening"

How do Yoda and Mace Windu respond
1311111122211121.title: The ship lands at the Jedi Temple

13111111222111211.content:
"Anakin Skywalker, the Chosen One, has gone with a group to destroy the Trade Federation blockade on Naboo," said Mace "I wish we could be more help to you."
"I felt a dark presence on Naboo," you say "In my experience, that can only mean two things, a Sith is there, or a Sith will be there."
"Are you saying there's a Sith on Naboo?" asked Sona
"I hope i'm wrong," you say "But just to be sure, we should go to Naboo, the Jedi there might be in danger"
"Thank you for telling us this, Masters, but we must take our leave" said Sona, bowing. You and Daria mimicked her.
You got back on the ship and set a course for Naboo.
You, Daria and Sona made preparations for what you knew you would have to do when you got there. You were going to run the blockade.
13111111222111211.title: They tell you to take him

131111112221112111.content:
As the ship comes out of hyperspace, you call to Sona and Daria. "Battle stations"
You felt, rather than saw, Daria and Sona take up positions on the gun turrets. You activated the weapons controlled in the cockpit. The ship went in. Fast. It took the droid computer a few seconds to realise it was being attacked. Then, it sent orders to it's droid starfighters to fire on you. They weren't fast enough. You flipped the ship over, and dodged the blaster fire as if you were merely hopping over a wire. Daria returned fire, and the fighter that had fired exploded. The ship entered the atmosphere of Naboo, having to slow down a bit for fear of breaking up in the atmosphere. This allowed the droid fighters to attack again. Again, you flipped the ship over, but this time, you shot down a fighter with the cockpit guns.
"Head for Theed Palace," you say "That's where they'll be"
"We'll have to shake off these fighters first," said Sona "Or they'll know where we are."
"Daria, Sona, we're gonna flip again, see if you can destroy all the fighters so we can go to the real battle" you say, hands on the gun controls again. The ship flipped. You shot fighters that you could and saw Daria and Sona doing the same. Soon, your ship was the only one still in the sky.
"All right, lets go for Theed," said Daria
131111112221112111.title: You get to Naboo

choices: The Jedi, Padme, a droid and a small boy
A dark cloaked guy with horns and red skin, painted with black tatoos
1311111122211121111.content:
As you near Theed Palace, you notice that many of the droids were heading out of the city.
"Looks like we might have some luck," you said "We won't have to fight an army, as we thought."
"We'd better land behind the Palace, that'll be lightly guarded," said Sona "We can't land in the hangar, obviously, it'll be crawling with droids."
You brought the ship into land and put up the defences needed to stop anyone from getting in while they were away.
You looked at who where you had parked the ship, thinking about if you could fortify it more. Finally, you turned away. "Let's go," you say "No lightsabers until we find the Jedi, or else they'll think we're Sith."
As you got to the back of the palace, you found a servant entrance. Pressing a small button beside the door, you walked into the Palace, Daria, your padawan, and Sona following behind you. Soon, you found a door that led into the inner palace. You opened the door and peered round it. seven battle droids guarded the door. None of them had seen you yet. You took out a small, sphere shape droid, turned it on and allowed it to fly into the room. Blue bolts of energy shot from it at the battle droids. Each one fell to the ground, temporarily deactivated. While the Saber Knights did not use blaster droids for training in the same way as Jedi, they had adapted them for discretion and battle.
"Move," you say to your companions and ran out at the deactivated droids. You grabbed two blasters from the droids' hands. Daria and Sona did the same. You deactivated the blaster droid and pocketed it.
"Lets go before these droids wake up." you say, moving off. as you were about to turn the corner, you heard voices. Peering round the corner, you see...
1311111122211121111.title: The battle of Theed

choices: Sona shoots six lightsabers at the droideka, which depletes its shields
You and Daria jump over the Droideka and attack the battle droids
13111111222111211111.content:
You stepped round the corner, Sona and Daria with you. The five companions turned, the Jedi unsheathing their lightsabers, while Padme pointed her blaster at them. The older Jedi, Qui Gon Jinn, deactivated his lightsaber when he recognised you.
"I thought you were dead," said Qui Gon "You fell to create a diversion and let us get away."
"We are Saber Knights," said Sona "We come to assist you in your quest to reclaim Theed."
"We are grateful for your help," said the Queen "But I am not familiar with the Saber Knights, who exactly are you?"
"We are the balance between good and evil," said Daria "The Jedi tip the Force towards good, the Sith, towards evil, our job is to keep the balance between them."
"Quite a burden," said the Queen "We are glad of your help, let us not dally."
Pulling out two lightsabers, you placed the blasters into your belt. Suddenly, you heard a mechanical voice say "Halt, intruders"
You looked around to see a squad of battle droids, led by a droideka.
13111111222111211111.title: The Jedi, Padme, a droid and a small boy

choices: You are cornered by battle droids
131111112221112111112.content:
You look at Daria and she nods. You both force jump over the Droideka as six of Sona's lightsabers fly through the air at it. You stand to the left of the battle droids, Daria, to the right. You hold up two lightsabers. So does she. You then throw your lightsabers at the battle droids, as does Daria. The lightsabers spin, like the propellors of a fan, slicing through droids. As they reach you, you use the force to turn them round and send them through more droids. Soon, all the droids were destroyed. Sona had destroyed the droideka in a few seconds. You and Daria had taken a few more seconds to destroy the battle droids. A silence followed the battle. The boy was the first to speak, and he summed up what they all must have been thinking in a single word. "Wow"
"We are indeed lucky to have your help," said Padme, looking at the scrap metal that surrounded the three Saber Knights.
"We do O.K," said Daria, shrugging "I am only a padawan, of course, a master like Yano could have done a lot better."
"Shall we keep going, then?" you ask, motioning to a door leading to the rest of the palace.
"I think we shall," said Padme "Come, I know the way."
Padme led the small group deeper into the palace.
131111112221112111112.title: You and Daria jump over the Droideka and attack...

1311111122211121111121.content:
Padme is about to move out of the corridor into the hangar. You hold up your hand to stop her. You point to a droid that is just round the corner, watching the corridor. You, again pull out the training droid. You turn it on, and allow it to go out of the corridor. A muffled clunk is heard as the droid guard falls to the ground. The training droid returns to you, and you turn it off.
"That looks like one of the training droids we use to train younglings in lightsaber combat," said Qui Gon.
"We use them for that as well, but we adapted them for combat against mechanicals," you say "I thought i'd bring one along, thought it might come in handy."
You pocketed the droid again.
"There are more droids inside, I won't be able to use the droid for them, they're holding the pilots hostage, we'll need to attack quickly, the battle droids aren't programmed for hostages, we should have an advantage."
"Anakin, find somewhere to hide," said Qui Gon. Anakin nodded, and left with the astromech droid.
Qui Gon and Obi Wan ignited their lightsabers. Sona and Daria also ignited their lightsabers. You walked into the view of the droids, your hands in the air to show that you were carrying no weapon.
"Freeze," said one of the droids "Get over here, keep your hands up, don't try anything."
You walked slowly towards the six droid guards, your hands still in the air. The droid gestured with the gun. When you were close enough to the droid speaker, you drew your blaster so fast, that none of the droids computer brains caught it. You shot it through the head, then threw the gun in the air, distracting the droids while you drew your lightsabers and dispatched them before they could fire a shot.
1311111122211121111121.title: You get to the hangar

13111111222111211111212.content:
You led them to the door to the hangar. The droids held the hostages in a group, huddled in the centre of the hangar area. There were thirty or so droids, all pointing their guns at the hostages. Some of them were mere children, even younger than Anakin, and they were terrified, clutching their parents with terror in their eyes. You pulled all of your lightsabers from your belt, and threw them into the air, holding them up with the force. Daria and Sona's lightsabers joined them. You looked at them, and they nodded. As one, every single lightsaber in the air ignited. And dropped. There were at least twenty lightsabers in the air, and each one found a droid, slicing it vertically in half. You retrieved your lightsabers as your fellow saber knights did the same. A door opened and the thirty droids that had been hidden in reserve came out to join the ten that had survived the attack. You ignited a second lightsaber, then felt a surge in the force that could only mean one thing. A Naboo starfighters cannons blasted the droids, incinerating every single one. You watched as the ship flew out of the hangar and into the sky.
"His starfighters on autopilot," you say "It must be programmed to fight in the space battle above."
"Let's move on," you say "We still need to clear the rest of the droids from the palace, although I think the worst is finally over."
13111111222111211111212.title: Your companions arrive

choices: He tries to force pushes all of the lightsabers away from him
131111112221112111112121.content:
Qui Gon held up a hand to stop you. "I sense a disturbance in the force," he said, as the doors in front of you rolled slowly open. Darth Maul was standing there, he was holding a lightsaber in both his hands.
"Padme, Captain, get back," said Obi Wan calmly "We'll handle this."
Obi Wan and Qui Gon ignited their lightsabers. Darth Maul ignited his. At both ends.
"Interesting," you say "I've never seen that technique before.
"You shall die here today," said Maul
"I don't thin we will," said Daria, igniting her own lightsaber. You and Sona followed suit.
"Ah," said Maul "The personal assassin of Darth Plagus, I shall take great pleasure in killing you."
Six lightsabers moved so fast nobody saw it. They surrounded Maul, all of them pointing at his throat.
"I'd like to see you try," said Sona "Surrender, and we'll let you live."
Qui Gon and Obi Wan looked at you, shocked. "You would allow a Sith to live?"
"Like he said," said Sona "I was once a Sith, the Jedi, they write off anyone who turns to the Dark Side, but the Saber Knights, they try to give them another option, someone else to turn to, we'll give him the same option, he will stand trial for his crimes, and if found guilty, he will be confined to a cell that nullifies the force. After he's served his time, he will be free to go, we will not control his choice, but if he chooses, he can join our order."
"I will never join you," said Maul
131111112221112111112121.title: Darth Maul

choices: Release Maul and fight him to the death
1311111122211121111121211.content:
You sensed Darth Maul trying to push the lightsabers away. You added your force power to Sona's just to be safe. Maul continued to push against the lightsabers, trying to get out of the prison that you and Sona had constructed from the Force.
"Stop trying to resist," you say "Your anger does not give you the control you think it does, we can help you onto the right path."
Sona contacted you through a Saber Knight mind link
"We can't keep this up for long," thought Sona
"I know," you replied Are you sure we shouldn't just kill him, it's what the Jedi would do and they are supposed to be the guardians of the peace." Unknown to Sona, you were testing her loyalty to the Saber Knights in this way.
"We shouldn't," said Sona "If I've learned anything from my time as a Saber Knight, its that everyone has the right to a fair trial."
"Well then," you say "I have an idea."
1311111122211121111121211.title: He tries to force pushes all of the lightsabers...

choices: Conferring with the Saber Knights council (Obi Wan and Qui Gon are there)
Conferring with the Saber Knights council (Queen Amidala speaks for the Senate)
13111111222111211111212111.content:
"I sense a force sensitive stone on your person, Obi Wan," you say "I may need it to contain Maul."
"How do you know?" asked Obi Wan "My force sensitivity is far more powerful than it, it should mask it."
"Saber Knights are far more attuned to the force," said Daria "I've been able to sense it for a while now."
"Here," said Obi Wan, taking it out of his Jedi robes and handing it to Daria.
"Daria, take over keeping Maul contained," you say, taking the stone and stepping back as Daria takes your place.
"You two, help as well, channel as much force energy as you can into Daria, Sona and this stone," you say. You sensed the flow of energy into the stone. You closed your eyes and concentrated. In your hand, the stone levitated off your hand and expanded. You poured more Force energy into it, making a large hole in it as it neared Darth Maul. It was now as large as a prison cell. You quickly brought it down over Mauls' head. Sona's lightsabers retreated slightly and fell to the ground, a few seconds before Sona joined them. You, Obi Wan and Qui Gon also collapsed on the ground. Daria, who hadn't poured as much energy into keeping Maul still as the rest, did not collapse, but still looked extremely tired.
"Well, that's that," you say "Maul will stand trial for his crimes against the people of Naboo."
"I would like to make a request," said Qui Gon "That the Republic Senate be the judges in this case."
"We must confer with our council," said Sona "Normally, our trials are a private matter among our order, not many people are happy about us giving inherently evil people second chances, but I am proof that it does work."
13111111222111211111212111.title: Execute your plan

choices: The Saber Knights train Anakin, The Senate judges Maul
The Jedi train Anakin, The Saber Knights judge Maul
131111112221112111112121112.content:
A hologram of the Saber Knight council chamber, with all the members present, appeared above the transmitter. Master Yano, having returned to Ilum, spoke
"News you have, Master Tanner, Master Seer, Padawan Daria?" asked Yank
"We have captured the Sith for trial, but Parke Amidala, Queen of Naboo as well as it's senator, has a request on behalf of the Senate."
You motioned Amidala to step forward.
"The Republic Senate have kept peace between systems, with the gel of the Jedi, for years, it is just a few rotten eggs, such as the Trade Federation, who are opposing that peace, showing them we have this Sith in custody would help to quell any future rebellion."
It was obvious her words had made an impact as she was met with utter silence.
Finally, Yank spoke. "Our trials are a very private matter, many Sith are very willing to change their ways, but if they are ridiculed and shamed by your people, it will push him back towards the dark side, do you want that, Padme Amidala?"
You were shocked. How did Yano know Amidala's first name? Parke looked just as shocked as you felt.
"There is a prophecy, Senator Amidala, a prophecy the Jedi have heard only in part," Yano continued "There is the part heard by the Jedi, that the Chosen One will bring balance to the Force, but what does this mean? The Jedi think it means the destruction of the Sith, but they are wrong, the Chosen One may become a very promising Jedi, but then he will fall in love and, plagued by visions of his beloveds death, will turn to the dark side to find a way to save her, but in the end, he will end up killing her."
"Why..." began Padme, but Yano cut her off.
"I tell you because the beloved is named in the prophecy, and her name is Padme Amidala," said Yano. Silence followed his words.
"I have a proposition," said another council member you did not know "Allow us to train Anakin and we will let you judge Maul's trial, or let the Jedi train Anakin and we'll take Maul back to our homeworld."
131111112221112111112121112.title: Conferring with the Saber Knights council (Quee...

choices: You find a squad of five droidekas rolling to attack you
13111111222111211112.content:
The Sith apprentice knelt before the hologram of his master. "What is thy bidding, my Master," said Darth Maul. You quickly cloaked yourself in the force so Darth Maul would not sense you.
"The Jedi will come to help their allies on Naboo," said the hologram "Kill them, as well as their companions, then your mission on this planet shall be complete."
"Yes, my Master," said Darth Maul "Master, a ship landed behind the palace before the Jedi arrived, but took off before I could identify it, I believe that the Jedi called for reinforcements to enter stealthily and scout out the area, I have put the droids on alert."
"You have done well, Maul," said the hologram "These intruders are of much interest to me, I want you to bring them to me, alive."
"It will be done, Master," said Maul. The hologram shut off, and Maul turned away from the door you were hiding behind. You pulled out your lightsaber, ready to attack Maul, when Sona put a hand on your arm. Looking to her, she shook her head, and pointed to a comlink on Maul's ear. He was in constant communication with the droids. If they attacked, the droids would hear the combat and come to attack in force, and there was quite a sizable force of droids in the palace, or so you assumed. You had no doubt you could defeat the droids, but not the droids and Maul at the same time. No. Better to meet up with the Jedi first and then kill all the droids and kill Maul. Satisfied with your plan, you followed as Sona took the lead.
13111111222111211112.title: Darth Maul

choices: Maul leaves. You are forced to watch him fight the Jedi on a holographic screen
Maul leaves, you defeat the droidekas and go to assist the Jedi
131111112221112111122.content:
As you turned your gaze away from Sona and back towards the corridor, you saw that five droidekas had surrounded you while you had been spying on Maul.
"Drop your weapons," said the robotic voice of one of the droidekas.
You looked at your companions, seeing if they had worked our a way to get out without revealing themselves. After they shook their heads, you dropped your blasters to the ground. Daria and Sona followed suit. The droidekas led you into the room where Darth Maul still stood.
"Ah," said Maul "We have company, hello, my master is very interested in speaking to you."
"So," you said "Who's the dark Lord of the Sith now, because you're obviously not the master.
"My master is the esteemed Lord Sidious," said Maul "And he asked me not to kill you, so watch your tongue if you want to get to him in one piece."
You feigned fear at Maul's statement, even faking the emotion in the Force. Not that it would matter, Maul was the sort of person who liked to intimidate people and he would see fear in the three of them as that was what he wanted to see.
"You won't win," said Daria "We have powerful allies, they'll come for us."
"Ah," said Maul "Your allies the Jedi, well, let's just say, they will soon be crushed beneath my power, before I take you to Sidious, you can watch as I crush your last hope."
131111112221112111122.title: You find a squad of five droidekas rolling to a...

13112.content:
You are Saber Apprentice Neil Odan, unlike many of your companions, you did not have a large number of lightsabers, just two. You preferred to use the force in unpredictable and unexpected ways to unsettle your opponent. Very few of your fellow padawans were able to defeat you in lightsaber combat, despite their lightsabers outnumbering yours. Recently, you had been taken as an apprentice by Joren Dall, the newest member of the Saber Knight council. Right now, you were training. You closed your eyes, feeling the force flow around you, you had been working on this fighting technique for some time, it was invented by Jedi Knight Tahl after she was blinded during a battle on Melida/Daan. Grand Saber Master Yano had met her while she was on a mission to Alderaan, and she had taught him the technique. The technique was in fact, a more advanced version of how youngsters learned the Force for the first time. You found it more effective than using your eyes. With your eyes still closed, you jumped onto one of the walls of the training room, using the Force to lock you in place. Then, you started to walk slowly along the wall, fighting with a force-powered disembodied lightsaber. Grand Saber Master Yano had used the Force to program the lightsabers to copy the fighting level of any opponent. As such, the lightsaber immediately engaged with you, forcing you backwards with each step. You backed up the wall towards the ceiling, giving ground, then, when you reached the ceiling, you jumped, somersaulting before landing feet first on the ground. You opened your eyes, and retrieved the force-powered lightsaber, turning it off and putting it away. You deactivated your own lightsabers and put them in your belt.
"Very good, Padawan," said a voice. You looked up to see Joren Dall, your master.
"I've got to prepare, the annual Padawan tournament is next week," you reply, bowing respectfully to Dall as you said it.
"I see you've perfected that Force walk you've been trying to create," said Master Dall "The Master should learn from the Padawan in most cases, but in your case, you may even be able to teach me something."
"I wouldn't agree with you, Master," you say "I'm only trying to challenge myself, I've challenged myself since I constructed my two lightsabers, I did not make any more because I believe that other aspects of training are just as important as being good with a lightsaber."
"My Padawan," said Master Dall, shaking his head slightly "I don't think there's anything about being a Saber Knight that I can teach you."
"I'm sure that's not true, Master," you say "My training is good, but i've got no experience outside of this Temple, it's your experience that you can teach me, Master."
"Speaking of missions," said Dall "We have been summoned to the Council chambers, I believe you are about to gain some experience."
13112.title: Character 2

choices: You could not use the force
13113.content:
Your name is Trey Mofei, you were born on a distant primitive planet outside of the Federation's domain named Tiforia. Tweenty years ago the planet was seized by a group called the Kreeacks. The Kreeacks are rumored to be run by the Sith. During their fight to conquer Tiforia a small band of saber Knights came to the planet's rescue. Unfortunately the small group was not enough and they were quickly defeated. As the few surviving knights fled the planet they found you. A small seven year old boy hiding under the floor bored of falling house from the Kreeack gangs that killed your parents. Knowing that if they left you there you would certainly be killed as well they chose to take you with them back to their home planet, Ilum. Once they arrived on Ilum they took you to the grand council where they would determine if you were able manipulate the force.

What did the council find?

1312322221.content: The Rakata were a powerful race of force users who had built an empire that stretched for light years in every direction across the galaxy. They were, however, corrupt and used the dark side of the force to manipulate and control everyone in their empire. Two of the Rakata disagreed with the philosophies held by much of the Rakata and, with a small band of followers, left their home world and their empire far behind. It wasn't long before the Rakata began to lose their force sensitivity, but for reasons unknown,the descendants of the original two Rakata who left their home world kept their sensitivity. They settled on Ilum, where they used their force-powered technology to build a magnificent temple. Following the formation of different factions of force-sensitive, the newly formed Saver Knights, their council led by former Jedi Master Yano, decided not to get involved in any of the conflicts between them except to maintain the balance between good and evil. You are one of the descendants of the original Rakata escapees, and you are about to undertake the trials to become a Saber Master, you will undertake a mission on your own without your master. As you walk into the council room, you wonder what mission the council has decided for you.
1312322221.title: Yes

choices: A year later- Daria's first mission
The next day- training with Daria
132121.content:
You are Saber Master Sona Seer, a former Sith and personal assassin to Darth Plagus, the master of Palpatine. You discovered the Saber Knights when out on a mission for Plagus to the planet Ilum to gather lightsaber crystals for his Sith acolytes. During this mission, you had discovered the secret order of the Saber Knights. In the caves of Ilum, you saw yourself for the first time, what a monster you had become, what monsters you had served under, you vowed to make sure that none of those monsters would ever walk the earth again, so she left, heading for Naboo, where she knew Darth Plagus and Sidious were hiding. When she got there, however, Plagus was dead, murdered by Sidious. Sidious had gone, left Naboo to continue his plans, whatever they might be, but in the house where both of them had been hiding, you found a young girl, only about seven or eight years old, just sitting there, fear in her eyes, even though the monsters were long gone.
"Come, child," you said "You are safe now."
The girl ran to you, throwing her arms around you. You were a little stunned, but hugged her back.
"What's your name?" you asked
"Daria," she said "You're not like them-" at this point she gestured to the still form of Darth Plagus.
"You're safe, Daria," you said "Come with me."
As you walked out of the room with Daria, you sensed a strong force presence probing you, but you shielded yourself with your own force powers. There was more to this Daria than met the eye.
You, along with Daria, returned to Ilum, where you were both welcomed into the Saber Knights. After a few years, you had mastered the ways of the Saber Knights and had taken Daria as a padawan. At least in the Saber Knights, there wasn't a possibility of being killed by your padawan.

Over the years, you trained Daria in the ways of the force, but felt impatient with her progress. Whilst you had progressed quickly through the training for the Saber Knights, Daria was much slower. Eventually, whilst continuing to train Daria, you became the most competent Saber Knight with lightsabers in the temple and was offered the rank of master. You were also given the title of lightsaber instructor, instructing all of the young padawans in lightsaber training.
132121.title: Character 1

1321211.content:
Daria's progress was slow, but she was passable enough to go on a mission outside the temple. You decided that perhaps the environment of the temple wasn't working to her advantage, so you had been pushing to take her out on a mission for a while.
"What's our mission, Master?" asked Daria, as she clipped lightsabers onto her belt, slipping smaller lightsabers into her boots.
"An old temple has been discovered on Felucia," you said "Master Yano believes it is one of the force temples, and these places always have a menacing force presence that is detrimental to the surrounding area, there are even rumours of the Sith performing experiments with the Force on the dead, under Darth Plaguis' tutelage, to find out how to bring back the dead."
"Thank you for giving me this chance, Master," said Daria, tying her boots as she spoke "I know I'm a disappointment to you..."
"No, no, Daria," you said "Why would you think something like that?"
"I've barely mastered one lightsaber style," said Daria "You've mastered more than I can count, from Jedi, Sith and Saber Knights, how many of your students are at my level?"
"Some students thrive in a temple environment, others do not," you said "That's why I've been pushing to take you out of that environment, and into one where you can learn better."
"So, Felucia?" said Daria "Jungle planet, right?"
"Breathable atmosphere, sentient plant species, and very few that are non-lethal, there is still a nomadic people on the planet, who know the edible plants, and avoid the plant creatures that would attack or poison them," you said "There are also the Acklay, massive omnivorous creatures with sharp teeth, and long necks to eat leaves of low-hanging branches. They're the reason there aren't really any animals on that planet any more."
"Good to know, thanks for the rundown," said Daria "I've heard descriptions like that my whole life, but now, I'm actually going to experience it."
1321211.title: A year later- Daria's first mission

1321212.content:
It was a rough landing on the planet Ilum. You had pushed the ship hard. You wanted to get as far away from the life you had once had as you possibly could. Away from the influence of the Dark Side. Once you had done that, however, you were faced with a problem of where you were going to go next. You didn't have a home anymore. You pushed back the memories of the terrible things you had done to the people you had once called family. You felt Daria stir in the chair next to you, and you once again felt her force presence gently prodding your shields. You continued to block her out. No child should have to experience what you had. Daria was trying to comfort her with her thoughts, but to let her do so, you would have to allow her to experience your memories as you had. You refused to traumatise Daria like that. You were broken, but perhaps she could still be saved. The Jedi would not take you. You had killed too many of their kind for their forgiveness. The best you could hope for with them was a swift death. You had learned that while the Sith, in their methods, were extreme, the Jedi were similarly extreme, just in the other direction. You did not want to associate with either of them.

It seemed the Force had a different idea in mind, for as you were locked in indecision about which path to take, you had been subconsciously working on the controls, entering the coordinates to a planet. You were now landing on Ilum. Picking up the now-sleeping Daria, and wrapping her in blankets, you opened the back of the ship, your twin lightsabers floating around the two of you, not yet ignited, but ready to defend if it came to a fight. Yano, master of the Saber Knights, had told her how to get in contact with him. Moving away from your ship, you entered a small, ice cave. Freezing cold by this point, you carefully placed the sleeping Daria on the ground, and sat down next to her. Crossing your legs in the lotus position, you cast your mind out, searching for the small Saber Knight Grandmaster with your mind.
"Let me help you," you saw Daria's face peeking out from the blankets "You're going to die if you don't let me in. If we work together, we'll be able to do whatever you're trying to do. What are you afraid of?"
"I'm broken, Daria," you said, as the feelings you had been holding back all of this time began to erupt from you. Floods of tears began falling from your eyes "I've seen so much pain and suffering. I don't want you to feel what I have. I don't want to do that to you."
You felt a small hand take yours, and you looked down. Daria was holding one of your hands with both of her smaller ones, and she was looking right into your eyes with a determined expression on her face.
"I'm not going to let you die, I owe you that much, you saved me from an eternity of pain and suffering, the least I can do is suffer some of yours in order to save your life."
And you once again felt a probing at your shield, but much stronger than before, and you heard Daria's thoughts in your head. You saw tears in her eyes as she experienced the memories you had been trying for so many years to suppress, in a few moments, but she looked up, as her eyes burned with determination. You felt her considerable force reserves, added to yours as both of you searched out with your minds, reaching out as far as you could. And finally, you felt something, a very powerful force presence, then multiple smaller ones converging on your position. As relief overwhelmed you, you felt yourself slipping into unconsciousness.
1321212.title: The next day

132211.content:
Unlike the rest of your species on the cold ocean world of Ojom, you were born to two refugees from a ship that crashed on Ilum. While looking for civilization, your parents had stumbled upon the temple of the Saber Knights. Starving and tired, both of your parents died in the hallway. However, you, carried as an egg by your father, rolled out of his pouch. By the time the Saber Knights found you, your parents were dead and you had just hatched and was trying to revive your parents, not understanding that they were both dead.

The Saber Knights took you in and found that you were able to manipulate the Force, perhaps due to the nature of your birth so close to the Ilum Force crystals that the Saber Knights guarded. As you got older, you learned mental control of all eight of your arms through the aid of the Force. Today you are aged 7 and you have been training for several months for the annual Padawan tournament.

info.brief_description: You've heard of the Jedi and the Sith? Now meet the ones who are inbetween
info.description:
This story is based on the story of 'the Ones' The Ones are very powerful force users who were so powerful, that 'The Father', the most powerful of them, took their planet out of time and space to keep his children from causing havok with their constant fighting. The Daughter represents the light side of the Force, while The Son represents the dark side. The Father represents the balance between them. From The Daughter, came the Jedi, from the Son, the Sith. The Father's followers have no name, but they dwell on the planet of Ilum, the same place where the Jedi once went to get crystals for their lightsabers. The Ilum Temple is where the followers dwell, they have mastered the Force in a way neither Jedi nor Sith have ever attempted. Their strength with the lightsabers they have an endless supply of is unequaled. They call themselves the Saber Knights because of this skill. Their order has not yet been discovered by the galaxy.

You may play the roll of of either a Jedi, a Sith, or a Saber Knight in your adventure that will bring all three groups together.

If you would like to see another version of this story, I'm posting a similar story on Fanfiction using the same characters, with a few extras: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/10893325/1/The-Third-Order

No swearing
No sex
No blood or gore
